activities: Pacific Interpreters has been delivering multilingual support solutions for twenty years. As the third largest provider of telephone interpreter services, we understand and adhere to the highest level of confidentiality and security. All Pacific Interpreters’ employees, customer service agents, and interpreters sign a HIPAA Confidentiality and Code of Ethics attestation before beginning their assignments and receive orientation on both topics. In addition, we do not retain or electronically store personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Pacific Interpreters provides telephonic interpreting, document translation, and consulting services to Healthcare, Business, and Government markets. In the normal course of business, we may interpret, translate, or process a variety of personal data.
privacyprograms: Pacific Interpreters is a member of the following privacy programs: Healthcare Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) and Payment Card Industry (PCI) Compliance.
recoursemech: European Union and Swiss data protection authorities.
